title: YARD / CUNO SHACK
description: Talk to Cuno about the content relating to his shack (after you've been inside)

dialogueTree.title: You: ""Cuno, let's talk about your shack.""

links.title: Cuno: ""The fuck do you want with it?""
links.text: "The fuck do you want with it?"

links.title: You: ""What was with the pighead?""
links.text: "What was with the pighead?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Oh that?" He picks a bit of dirt f..."
links.text: "Oh that?" He picks a bit of dirt from his fingernail. "Cuno decapitates pigs. That's just a Cuno demo-tape."

links.title: You: ""Were you trying to send me a messa..."
links.text: "Were you trying to send me a message of some sort?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Uh..." Cuno's eyes light up. "Yeah..."
links.text: "Uh..." Cuno's eyes light up. "Yeah! To the both of you. *Watch your ass in Cuno's town or Cuno's gonna fuck your head off*."

links.title: Composure: "He is incredibly pleased with himse..."
links.text: He is incredibly pleased with himself right now.

links.title: Cuno: ""Uh..." Cuno's eyes light up. "Yeah..."
links.text: "Uh..." Cuno's eyes light up. "Yeah! Watch your ass in Cuno's town or Cuno's gonna fuck your head off."

links.title: You: ""Demo-tape? Like some kind of a mus..."
links.text: "Demo-tape? Like some kind of a musician?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, Cuno plays on snuff radio. F..."
links.text: "Yeah, Cuno plays on snuff radio. Fucks pigs. Live. Fucks their heads off." He ominously points to the shack. "Cuno's a cop killer."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "... and somewhere, someone is jerki..."
links.text: ... and somewhere, someone is jerking off to it, just like Noid said. Tune in to snuff radio.

links.title: You: ""Cool pig-head. I liked it. I got o..."
links.text: "Cool pig-head. I liked it. I got one too, this one." (Point to your head.) "It's shit."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What?""
links.text: "What?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Uh..." He looks confused. "What is..."
links.text: "Uh..." He looks confused. "What is this shit... Fuckin' on yourself? This is weird-level shit, Cuno doesn't go there."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Fuck your shit back to normal. Wha..."
links.text: "Fuck your shit back to normal. What is this?"

links.title: Conceptualization: "Well played. *No one* saw that comi..."
links.text: Well played. *No one* saw that coming.

links.title: You: "Forget it, I'm not saying those thi..."
links.text: Forget it, I'm not saying those things...

links.title: Cuno: ""Too brutal for you, huh? Cuno fuck..."
links.text: "Too brutal for you, huh? Cuno fuck your tongue off?"

links.title: You: "(Whisper.) "Yes. I think I'm going..."
links.text: (Whisper.) "Yes. I think I'm going insane, Cuno."

links.title: Cuno: ""Uh..." He looks you in the eye. "W..."
links.text: "Uh..." He looks you in the eye. "Why you fuckin' on yourself in front of Cuno? Talk Kingdom to Cuno or fuck off."

links.title: You: ""No, I just want to get back to the..."
links.text: "No, I just want to get back to the shack."

links.title: Cuno: ""F'course you want back in there. E..."
links.text: "F'course you want back in there. Everyone wants back in there."

links.title: You: ""I found a plate covered with powde..."
links.text: "I found a plate covered with powder residue -- know anything about it?"

links.title: Cuno: ""That's where Cuno gets his daily h..."
links.text: "That's where Cuno gets his daily hit of electric, Cuno's *shazam*. Cuno rides the fucking lightning in there, pig."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Bet you'd like to ride the lightnin..."
links.text: Bet you'd like to ride the lightning too, wouldn't you? You feel tired and old, but you could have that sparkle in your eyes...

links.title: You: ""What's with the tube of Magnesolam..."
links.text: "What's with the tube of Magnesolam, Cuno?"

links.title: Cuno: ""It's a vitamin, pig. Don't you kno..."
links.text: "It's a vitamin, pig. Don't you know anything?" He looks at you like you just pointed at the sun and asked what it was.

links.title: Endurance: "You could use some."
links.text: You could use some.

links.title: You: ""It's magnesium, right?""
links.text: "It's magnesium, right?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, it's the *Mag*! You fucking..."
links.text: "Yeah, it's the *Mag*! You fucking *need* that shit to stay on top of your game. Cuno goes through like a tube a day, rips Mag like a motherfucker. And you could use a *barrel*."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Don't teach him, Cuno! He's gonna..."
links.text: "Don't teach him, Cuno! He's gonna use it against you, Cuno!"

links.title: You: ""I know all about magnesium. I rock..."
links.text: "I know all about magnesium. I rock it all the time."

links.title: Cuno: ""You're not getting this, pig! It *..."
links.text: "You're not getting this, pig! It *completely* takes away the hangover. It's like you didn't do *anything*! Like you stayed home playing with your choo-choo." He looks at you, eyes bulging.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Fuck you, pig! Don't do Mag! You'r..."
links.text: "Fuck you, pig! Don't do Mag! You're gonna OD and you're gonna fucking die!"

links.title: You: ""C'mon, it's just magnesium, don't..."
links.text: "C'mon, it's just magnesium, don't mystify it."

links.title: You: ""Okay, whatever.""
links.text: "Okay, whatever."

links.title: Cuno: ""Okay? Whatever?! You fucking *need..."
links.text: "Okay? Whatever?! You fucking *need* that shit to stay on top of your game. Cuno goes through like a tube a day. And you look like you could use a *barrel*."

links.title: You: ""Is that my coat up there? I'm pret..."
links.text: "Is that my coat up there? I'm pretty sure it's mine." (Point to your coat waving in the wind.)

links.title: Cuno: ""Is it?" Cuno squints at it. "You g..."
links.text: "Is it?" Cuno squints at it. "You got pretty fucked. Cuno's surprised you've still got your head after all that."

links.title: You: ""After all what?""
links.text: "After all what?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Don't sweat it, drunk-pig." Cuno t..."
links.text: "Don't sweat it, drunk-pig." Cuno taps his nose twice in conspiracy. "Cuno will keep your nasty secrets. Cuno's not snitchin'."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "He's saying you climbed up there. H..."
links.text: He's saying you climbed up there. He probably saw you do it.

links.title: Endurance: "That explains the callouses on your..."
links.text: That explains the callouses on your hands. You scaled the side of the building, entertaining the local kids.

links.title: Logic: "Yep, that *conclusively* explains h..."
links.text: Yep, that *conclusively* explains how the coat got up there.

links.title: You: ""Thanks, kid.""
links.text: "Thanks, kid."

links.title: Cuno: ""Whatever, piggy.""
links.text: "Whatever, piggy."

links.title: You: ""Could I get into the harbour from..."
links.text: "Could I get into the harbour from the roof?"

links.title: Cuno: ""'Course you fucking can. How do yo..."
links.text: "'Course you fucking can. How do you think Cuno made all the docky boys his gimps? Just gotta fly, pig."

links.title: You: ""I know. I've jumped that.""
links.text: "I know. I've jumped that."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, Cuno saw you barely making i..."
links.text: "Yeah, Cuno saw you barely making it... shit was pathetic."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Almost landed on your fat ass ther..."
links.text: "Almost landed on your fat ass there!"

links.title: Physical Instrument: "They're mistaken. The jump was exec..."
links.text: They're mistaken. The jump was executed to perfection.

links.title: You: ""I tried that. It didn't go so well.""
links.text: "I tried that. It didn't go so well."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno knows. Cuno and C saw you shi..."
links.text: "Cuno knows. Cuno and C saw you shit yourself. It's okay, pig. Not everyone can face the fear -- Cuno style."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "That's all there is to it, then! Do..."
links.text: That's all there is to it, then! Don't be a pansy, just *jump*!

links.title: You: ""Is that it? Easy.""
links.text: "Is that it? Easy."

links.title: Cuno: ""Not for you, pig! Cuno can't wait..."
links.text: "Not for you, pig! Cuno can't wait to see you get all scared and shit your pants."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Cuno can't wait to see you shit yo..."
links.text: "Cuno can't wait to see you shit your fat pants!"

links.title: You: ""I've got to jump to get in there?..."
links.text: "I've got to jump to get in there? At my age? In my condition?!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Not everyone can fly like Cuno. Yo..."
links.text: "Not everyone can fly like Cuno. You're old, you'll never make it." Cuno crosses his arms. "Moose piss has made you scared in the head."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Moose piss is probably alcohol."
links.text: Moose piss is probably alcohol.

links.title: You: ""I've heard enough of this.""
links.text: "I've heard enough of this."

links.title: Cuno: ""Good call pigmeister. Don't come a..."
links.text: "Good call pigmeister. Don't come and talk to Cuno about his Kingdom."

dialogueTree.title: You: ""Cuno, I found your shack." (Point..."
dialogueTree.text: "Cuno, I found your shack." (Point to the shack.)

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah? Did you fuck in there?""
links.text: "Yeah? Did you fuck in there?"

links.title: Cuno: ""You found Cuno's secret door to Cu..."
links.text: "You found Cuno's secret door to Cuno's secret shack?! It was closed for five thousand years. How the fuck did you get in?"

links.title: You: ""I pushed the panels aside, Cuno.""
links.text: "I pushed the panels aside, Cuno."

links.title: Cuno: ""And then what? You fuck in there?..."
links.text: "And then what? You fuck in there? You fuck in Cuno's kingdom?"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""He's tryin'a fuck at you again, Cu..."
links.text: "He's tryin'a fuck at you again, Cuno!"

links.title: You: ""I *phase-shifted* through the roof..."
links.text: "I *phase-shifted* through the roofing material."

links.title: Cuno: ""Shit... get the fuck out of here!..."
links.text: "Shit... get the fuck out of here! You can't do that."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""He can't do that, Cuno! He's tryin..."
links.text: "He can't do that, Cuno! He's tryin'a fuck at you again!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Pigs can't displace, can't do that..."
links.text: "Pigs can't displace, can't do that teleport shit..." He says to himself, then turns to you.

links.title: Cuno: ""How did you like it in there, pigg..."
links.text: "How did you like it in there, piggo-boy? Cuno's got a lot of cool shit there, right?"

links.title: You: ""Before we go on with that let's ta..."
links.text: "Before we go on with that let's talk about how you said it was just some roofing material some gimps left behind. That was a *lie*."

links.title: Cuno: ""Pig, that's the past. You and Cuno..."
links.text: "Pig, that's the past. You and Cuno are *now*. Let's talk about how you opened the secret door, fucking at Cuno's kingdom."
